attributes.action: What benefits does the average British taxpayer get from the EU?
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Can someone please explain why Britain contributes in the region of £45,000,000 to the EU? The average British taxpayer does not seem to benefit in any way at all.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
